item.title: First Steps In Hugo
item.description: Everything new in 2020 so it is time to start my first blog and I decided to go with Hugo as a static site generator. Let´s see where this leads us to. Things I like so far: Easy to install Many Themes available Fast! Good Documentation Content in Markdown Dynamic Reload when Content changes Code Rendering #!/usr/bin/python print("Hello World")
item.content:
Everything new in 2020 so it is time to start my first blog and I decided to go with Hugo as a static site generator.

Let´s see where this leads us to.

Things I like so far:

  • Easy to install
  • Many Themes available
  • Fast!
  • Good Documentation
  • Content in Markdown
  • Dynamic Reload when Content changes

Code Rendering

#!/usr/bin/python
print("Hello World")
